comments:
When I close Eclipse with an active task editor I get the exception below when reopening Eclipse. Looks like TaskEditorInputFactory.createElement(IMemento) returns null since task list has not been initialized when the method is invoked.

-- Error Log --
Date: Fri Oct 13 20:02:40 EDT 2006

Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.ui
Stack Trace:

Yes, this is due to the work-in-progress on bug 145686.

I resolved this by moving Task List initialization to happen on workbench start, not asynchronously after workbench start.  I could not reproduce any bugs, but we have to watch this very carefully.

Rob, Steffen: please update your bootstrap workspaces if possible.
I have done limited testing and not exprienced any errors. All editors were restored correctly.

traces.message: Factory org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasks.ui.editors.TaskEditorInputFactory returned null from createElement for editor id=org.eclipse.mylar.tasklist.ui.taskEditor name=Task #140512
